attributes.action: Pressure the entire EU and its Trade Commissioner to quickly sign an FTA with the Brazilians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thanks to the biofuels it produces cost-efficiently (unlike the EU) from sugarcanes, Brazil is now completely oil-independent, so we urge the Prime Minister and the Trade Commissioner to conclude a FTA with the Brazilians to facilitate quick, tariff-free, cheap, secure import of biofuels from Brazil, thus making it easier for poor Brazilians to survive.
